showerReviews.reviewText: Normally I don't review gas station but the bathroom looked cool, lol. They also had the new funyus!
Stopped by to put gas and buy some provisions on our way to Houston, very clean restrooms and good food
Nothing at pumps to clean windshield during i37 butterfly migration. No water at all not impressed at all

Definitely wasn't what I expected. Basically stopped to walk a few and use the restroom. The store was clean and the restrooms were very clean and quite big. I was impressed with your quality of service and it speaks volumes with the ‚Ä¶
Friendly and helpful employees. Restrooms are refreshingly clean. Offers a variety of snacks, souvenirs, and some automotive/truck fluids and accessories.Deli starts serving breakfast tacos at 4 am.

showerReviews.reviewText: Happy faces and clean places let‚Äôs talk about this love in Von army. Went and took a shower the shower wouldn‚Äôt clean at all why loves. Family faces now come on people y‚Äôall can do better. It‚Äôs not the LOVES Motto

I had an extremely frustrating experience at the Love‚Äôs Truck Stop today. Unfortunately, the behavior of one of the employees was completely unprofessional and unacceptable at counter next to shower at 11:50am. ‚Ä¶
The truck shower #2 today at 10 am was filthy. Shard spots still in toilet, bug on floor, hair everywhere as if it hadn‚Äôt been sweep in days. Please see pics
Yo I showered here, it was $18 and a 3 minute wait. Lady working the showers was so nice and friendly. 10/10 experience, would shower here again üòª ‚Ä¶

‚Ä¶ and hard to find parking but that's life. Now this guy at the fuel desk, didn't get his name, beige shirt, bad attitude,   a trainer fueled his truck and tried to pay for a shower for his trainee. This jerk tells him he can't do that, ‚Ä¶

‚Ä¶ at this store was by far worst experience I've ever experienced in a loves travel center. I waited over 2 hours to get a shower.an when I went to check to see how many showers they had I was met by a group of loves employees who work in ‚Ä¶

I will never come to this location again! Walked inside to take a shower. As soon as I walked in lady said ‚ÄúNo Shower, Short Staff.‚Äù I thought okay whatever I‚Äôll go use the bathroom. As soon as I went in a lady opened the mens bathroom to ‚Ä¶

‚Ä¶ I was the only one needing a shower at this time of night, so I got right in. The shower room is kinda outdated but still good. The shower itself looks brand new and very nice. Good water pressure and I had no issue with hot water. ‚Ä¶

‚Ä¶ but don‚Äôt empty out the trash cans in the stalls. There‚Äôs always pee on the floor. It always smells. The staff does greet you at least. I used the shower and the floors were gross and sticky. They do have a Carl‚Äôs Jr. Which is pretty cool.
Towels made me smell worse than I did before showering after two days ‚Ä¶

showerReviews.reviewText: ‚Ä¶ this truck stop for over 20 years I never got poorly treated like this the same thing when I went to go take a shower the guy argue with me I asked him for an extra towel he said management said they're not allowed to give extra towels what ‚Ä¶

For a petro it‚Äôs actually pretty good! Shower was decent, had a new shower head that worked great. Bathroom wasn‚Äôt extremely disgusting, pretty decent actually. Lot isn‚Äôt too bad either, I didn‚Äôt notice any extreme smells or trash lying ‚Ä¶
Great food!!! Awesome staff, very friendly. Store however is a little on the small side. Shower rooms and restrooms are beautiful and clean. Lounge area is very nice as well.

Absolutely degenerate staff, I have spent a $800 fuel bill with a team driver. And one driver went to shower while the other was in the cab. This is at 2am with no one at all on the pump. She walks in and starts knocking on my shower door ‚Ä¶

‚Ä¶ Bear was good for me better than the skillet. Redeem your ultra credit for a decent meal. I had good service. Looked clean but I didn‚Äôt shower so can‚Äôt comment on that. Was able to find a spot at noon easy enough. Did fill up overnight
No wait for a shower at 6pm on Tuesday.. Clean, good laundry room, quiet TV room, best restaurant in a chain truck stop, service bays, and a Blue Beacon
I had Shower #4 & it was awesome. Hot water, great pressure, and plenty of room to maneuver. The shower was very clean as well. Will definitely return next time I'm in San Antonio. ‚Ä¶

I‚Äôve always found parking. Great Mexican food across the street. That‚Äôs about it with this place. Showers are pretty bad. No venting so it‚Äôs super humid. Shower floor slope is pretty bad so be careful not to slip. Gotta move the bench if ‚Ä¶
Fuel desk fella was very nice.  Store attendant was very nice as well.  Shower room was small but shower was nice and hot... but y'all need exhaust fans to help with steam issues.

Like any other Petro, only thing that sucked about this place is that they no longer do Team Showers. Each individual driver needs to provide their own Ultra One card to shower. Just fueled over $400 dollars and I received 1 shower. Asked ‚Ä¶

showerReviews.reviewText: Very neat and clean truck stop. Very well organised. Shower waits were normal In a real busy time. Well done management and staff. Thanks for letting us use your facilities

Shower for professional drivers cost something like $18. You'd think for that much you could get a shower where "cleaning it" doesn't simply mean letting it dry and putting new towels in it. Towels that they can't seem to ever get actually ‚Ä¶

THEY ARE OPEN AGAIN!!!
WOO HOO FEELS GREAT TO BE IN A CLEAN NEW STORE, LOVE IT!!!
They r still doing a little work, but u can stop on in to get ur faves. I'll let ‚Ä¶

Best Flying J I‚Äôve ever seen. Clean, well organized just amazing . But those are not all, this flying J has a unique thing. Best stuff are working here and they are doing their jobs perfect! On this time on this date, which I‚Äôm writing this ‚Ä¶
The manager is doing a really good job by keeping the place very clean. The restrooms and showers is clean. He‚Äôs very friendly and he got a great staff also. I recommend stopping
